articles.title: Fed Keeps Rates Steady, Grows Cautious on Inflation; Gold, USD, Yields Await Powell - DailyFX
articles.description: The Federal Reserve held interest rates unchanged for the sixth consecutive meeting, in line with expectations. Powell may offer more clues about the policy outlook during his press conference.
articles.content:
